website_summaries.verdict: Rugged protection for your console and gear.
pros: This bag stands out for its high-quality materials and weather-proof design
The compartments provide a good amount of space and are well padded
Comfortably fits any Xbox model with 2 controllers and cables
cons: You probably won't have space for a headset

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Travel Case!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this quickly before a trip without doing much research, I honestly feel like I lucked out. This travels case feels to be made of high quality materials, it is durable and does just what it's supposed to. In traveling I packed the following Xbox One X Elite Controller (in the hard nylon travel case) Astro A50 Wireless (headset & base) 3 USB cords HDMI cord Power Cord A few Games in cases Seagate 4TB External Hard Drive and I still had room to pack a few more things if needed. I would break down a pros and cons list, but honestly there are no cons that I've found yet.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to make my own portable xbox. I put an under laptop fan below, xbox one s, and a clamped Gstory screen and to me it beats any of those all in one setups by a mile. I can remove and story everything I need when I need it and the case has held up great. The top compartments are perfect to keep everything plugged in so all I need to do is plug in one power strip and its up and running!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Cruser

customer_reviews.title: Our boys love this travel case
customer_reviews.text: Our boys love this travel case. Besides the Xbox console and power cord, it easily fits 6 of their favorite games along with 2 controllers. Its been everywhere and so far, no complaints. Sturdy construction with enough padding for what needs to be carried inside it.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.A-NYC

customer_reviews.title: Carrying Gaming Case
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool carrying case for traveling. Flexible Velcro section separators. Warning, it’s not meant to protect the gaming system in the event it’s dropped or your packing for air travel, it’s just for carrying and keeping organization.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Logan

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything a gamer needs
customer_reviews.text: I send my son cross-country with his Xbox One to visit family. This case is perfect for everything he needs: power cord, headphones, 2 controllers, charging base, and the Xbox One and HDMI cable. There was even a little room left over. And space for game disks and books/booklets. The shoulder strap is solid and comfortable as a carry on the airplane. I like that when my son packs it all up to bring it home he won’t forget anything since it all has a place in the case. Seems like good quality. I hope it’s durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Solid case, good size
customer_reviews.text: Clearly a purpose-built Xbox case. I travel with it frequently and it holds things together well. Space for the console, cables, and more. It's got six places for controllers, and the only issue I have is when you place your controllers in slots on the left and right (rather than middle), they have a habit of sliding out when the case is opened. I carry two controllers and have to store them in the middle two slots because of this. Case fits well in overhead bins and underneath seats, and is proportional in size to whatever luggage you may carry with it. Could use a strap on the bag to slide onto a rollerboard carry handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality and it fits perfectly for XBOX ONE X
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly for my XBOX ONE X, and my three controls and other wires! I loved it! Its quality is really high, and the option to make partitions is awesome and its front pocket is perfect to put another things, I use it to save my iPad and my iPad wireless keyboard too, but you can save in it whatever you want! It's perfect to travel!
customer_reviews.author: IVAN FELIPE PEREZ TORRES

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for traveling kids.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my little nephew for when he comes over with his XBOX. He loves every bit of it. He can fit his XBOX with cords, two controllers and his headset with a bit of extra space left and still has mesh on the outside to hold some extras too. Padding in this is enough to absorb drops from his height but I wouldn't test it at any other height.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Seems very sturdy and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my Grandsons birthday, which hasn’t happened yet, so he has something to tote his gaming system and accessories in. Seems to be well made and plenty of room, but won’t know for sure how it holds up until he gets to use it. Quick two day delivery as a Prime member made sure to get it to us on time.
customer_reviews.author: Sci-Fi Officianado

customer_reviews.title: Glade I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Love it...keeps my son's Xbox One safe and undamaged as he transports it from place to lace and makes it easy to carry and keep everything so nothing's lost. So glad I purchased it. Brought another type first but it was cheaply made and more expensive. This one high quality. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little small for an XBox One standard model
customer_reviews.text: It works OK for an XBox One. I notice now that all the photos are of an XBox One X model, not a standard XBox One- and doesn't allow space for the external power adapter that is used on the standard XBox One. In my opinion, the case is just a few inches too small when you have a standard XBox One with an external power brick. It's not a bad case - it's just a little small. I wish I had payed a bit more attention to the details.
customer_reviews.author: loudaxe

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Game Case!
customer_reviews.text: This travel case holds everything including the headset. Made well & I think the best you will find. My only complaint is the chemical smell it has. I aired it out but the smell is still strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Case!
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this to transport his XBox to friends! It's such a nice case and super easy for him to quickly put all his gaming things in it. And more importantly it keeps all his expensive gaming things safe even when he's tossing the case about. It's a great price for such a nice case!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Joy Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Best console carrying case in the game!
customer_reviews.text: This is highly durable and super convenient for traveling. It also has tons of storage and is easy to carry around anywhere your going! Definitely recommend getting this for yourself or buying as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Lee M.

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son. He received a new Xbox for Christmas. In order to keep all his accessories together and protected, I looked at several options. He loves the color, the ability to set smaller compartments to the size you want, and the convenience of having it all in one place. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Osprey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old got a Xbox for his birthday and wanted to transport it back and forth between houses and this has worked perfectly! He fits the console, 2 controllers, headset, and games in there. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old nephew for his birthday since he's constantly traveling back and forth. He uses it for his xbox and loves it. It's very convenient and has held up for almost four months now. He keeps his console, cords, remote, headphones, and a couple of games in there. Its reallt simple to use that he does all the packing and unpacking himself.
customer_reviews.author: Mary517

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as Christmas gifts for the serious gamers in our family who travel with their jobs. They all LOVED their carrying cases and can't believe this was on the market.
customer_reviews.author: robin9770

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage of .....
customer_reviews.text: my son's gaming console. He is often out of town on business so he wanted this so he could take his stuff with him. Made a great birthday gift for him:-)
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J Spillman

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to store my XBOX One and all of its components for a cross country trip by car. This lived up to, and surpassed my expectations. You can create pockets via the velcro dividers, and it stores a good amount. When closed it looks sleek, and offers a good amount of protection. It's great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: NotAReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Paid $44.99 and I'm returning it. Poorly made for the price. It's worth about half the price I paid. I'll keep looking for a good case for my son to take to sleepovers.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This case holds everything that I need to carry and keeps it secure. I have been looking for an Xbox travel case for months and finally chose this based on price and ratings. I am completely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: X-box three with controls and all the gear fit nicely, well organized. A must for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For What We Needed
customer_reviews.text: This product is just what grandson needed, it carries all the accessories and box to stay organized.
customer_reviews.author: DEnise

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: The case is perfect. My grandson is able to fit the console, controller, and headset into the case. It’s exactly what he needed to transport safely.
customer_reviews.author: Renee0966

customer_reviews.title: Good travel case
customer_reviews.text: This travel case meets my needs. It does indeed carry all my stuff plus there is extra space for additional items or accessories. The reason for 4 stars rather than 5 is: The internal separator is not stiff enough and items tend to shift and move about is the case during travel. Not a factor in the rating: It would be nice if there was game disc pockets as part of the internal separator.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Guice

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Carry All
customer_reviews.text: Son liked it for his Xbox one. Was able to for all his accessories and console in a neat compact manner.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson received this game case as a Christmas gift and absolutely loved it. It is very roomy and sturdy; he couldn't wait to pack his game box, controller, etc. into the case.
customer_reviews.author: Rita - Fan1

customer_reviews.title: Works SO Well
customer_reviews.text: Used it only for going to friend's house for a while but actually took it on a vacation and it worked great! Fits everything I need, and I had no problems with anything inside. Only problem is I upgraded to a Xbox One S after buying this and the One S kinda slides around and I needed to put the blockers in and they didn't help that much. Other than then that it's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: BJ Steffen

customer_reviews.title: Great case for My Xbox One X Scorpio Edition
customer_reviews.text: This is a soft shell case that Easily holds my Xbox One X, two controllers, my headset, all the cables with room left for games. Seems pretty well made.
customer_reviews.author: John Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag
customer_reviews.text: Like the bag works for everything Console, Power Cord, HDMI cable, External Hard Drive with room to Spare. The 50$ Price seems a Little Steep. Not a lot of options for the Original XBox One Console. Like the Bag Not the Price Point. But makes it so much easier to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Stewart Siemers

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I was able to fit all items for my Xbox, minus the monitor of course, with no problem in here. Good quality materials and easy to customize the storage areas to measure everything. If you need a carrying case for your Xbox, definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Christian F.

customer_reviews.title: Great storage solution
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for storing and transporting the Xbox & accessories. I purchased it as a gift and have heard great responses.
customer_reviews.author: Ordinary Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use it for traveling with my Xbox One and I like it. Especially for the price. Gets the job done. However if you require a carrying case to be more rugged, this might not be for you. Having a soft instead of a hard exterior is the only reason I give it 4 and not 5 stars. Can't beat it at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It did it’s job
customer_reviews.text: Was well for my husband air plane travel. A little small so if you wanted to bring more than one game with a controller or two you had to play Tetris with the bag. Some straps were not needed. But it did it’s job just fine. It was soft yet sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, protects it's contents
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this case to pack his X Box around. The compartments move around so he can set it up how he wants it. Very nicely made so your stuff feels safe and protected.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case for carrying your Xbox to your friend’s house!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A good product with several compartments Bought two of these now
customer_reviews.author: wolfric

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This carrying case is perfect for my son to transport his Xbox 1 consol along with all his accessories. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Great for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: Good for “mobile” Xbox gamers. This is t meant to be used for shipping, but it is perfect for traveling by car/train/boat.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product came as described and the stitching was well sewn and seemed very strong. This case is perfect for my son who travels back and forth between college and home. Hopefully, the product will meet my expectations and last considering it looks so well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn-Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Easy protective carrying case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 15yr old son . He loves it . Perfect for his xbox 1 , he loves to take his game console when we travel , or go to friends or family's. The size is perfect not to big or small easy to pack & carry. This case is also very protective which is most important.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son’s Xbox One and it’s absolutely perfect. This makes it very convenient and safe to carry all his controllers, earphone and console in one.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael S

customer_reviews.title: Seams comimg apart!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well for 3 or 4 months but now is coming apart at the seams. It was used to carry 1 Xbox One and 2 controllers for which it was designed. Product info states that it has a 3 year warranty. Would like to know what that warranty covers and how to access it.
customer_reviews.author: sharlene

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used to always pack my Xbox in my travel bag with my clothes and not have enough space. With this bag takes car of EVERYTHING! All my controllers, games and extra cables! I recommend this especially if you travel and want to bring your Xbox with you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: This case is legit. If you are a gamer, and keep it mobile for gaming at various locations... this case keeps your equipment padded and tight in place! easy to carry too
customer_reviews.author: K-Po

customer_reviews.title: Very useful.
customer_reviews.text: Son uses it to take Xbox 1x with him to dads house. Good quality, convenient, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mason

customer_reviews.title: Spacious.
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional quality for the price. My son is Autistic and like to take his game system to friends. I purchased this to insure it doesn’t get damaged. Very please with the product.

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy again
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this. Easy to load and went right on the airplane with no problems Perfect for traveling, it’s a must have
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am seriously surprised and pleased with this case. It's exceeded my expectations. Timely delivery and the quality is on par. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect

customer_reviews.title: Xbox carry case...
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, had it in no time. Should work great for my xbx and headset when I go on the road. Lots of room for accessories.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty case
customer_reviews.text: Great case very heavy duty and hold the Xbox perfect

customer_reviews.title: Everything fits and is an overall excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product. Fits everything that I need for an Xbox. I can put my Xbox one X and my cords in the same slot, while having my elite controller, another controller, external hard drive, and some games on the other side. Very easy to carry as well.

customer_reviews.title: Good carrying case

customer_reviews.title: Good case for Xbox and accessories.
customer_reviews.text: Good case, easy to adjust and organize the Xbox accessories. Just could be a little bigger, got it all in there but it’s a tight squeeze.

customer_reviews.text: Being able to adjust the individual spaces to fit everything as needed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storage when not in use and for travel

customer_reviews.title: Most of it is Velcro inside

product_meta.title: USA GEAR Console Carrying Case Compatible with Xbox One and Xbox 360 with Accessory Storage for Controllers, Cables, Headsets and Padded Shoulder Strap - Fits All Xbox Models - Green
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY DURABLE EXTERIOR: Tightly Woven RipStop Nylon over a reinforced shell with padded interior gives your Xbox One X the best protection from water damage, scratches, and impacts.
HOLDS EVERYTHING YOU NEED: Be it multiple controllers, cables, headphones, or anything else you need, with the customizable and spacious interior, this case can hold it. Fits all Xbox Console Models
EXTERNAL ZIPPERED POCKET: For even more storage and customization, our Xbox Case features external pockets for smaller items like HDMI Cables, Power Cables, and anything else you need quick access to
PADDED SHOULDER STRAP & HANDLE: The S13 features 2 convenient carrying options to sling over your shoulder or comfortably carry in hand || Padded dividers provide extra protection for your gear
3 YEAR WARRANTY: All USA Gear products are premium quality made, and to show our faith in this, we back all our merchandise by a 3 year Manufacturer Warranty
